channel.title: CVE Feed for Huawei Technologies Co., Ltd. -- DP300,RP200,TE30,TE40,TE50,TE60
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Huawei Technologies Co., Ltd. -- DP300,RP200,TE30,TE40,TE50,TE60

item.title: CVE-2017-15314|2024-08-05T19:50:16.500Z -- huawei%20technologies%20co.%2C%20ltd. -- dp300%2Crp200%2Cte30%2Cte40%2Cte50%2Cte60
item.description: Huawei DP300 V500R002C00, RP200 V500R002C00SPC200, V600R006C00, TE30 V100R001C10SPC300, V100R001C10SPC500, V100R001C10SPC600, V100R001C10SPC700, V500R002C00SPC200, V500R002C00SPC500, V500R002C00SPC600, V500R002C00SPC700, V500R002C00SPC900, V500R002C00SPCb00, V600R006C00, TE40 V500R002C00SPC600, V500R002C00SPC700, V500R002C00SPC900, V500R002C00SPCb00, V600R006C00, TE50 V500R002C00SPC600, V500R002C00SPC700, V500R002C00SPCb00, V600R006C00, TE60 V100R001C10, V500R002C00, V600R006C00 have a memory leak vulnerability due to memory don't be released when the XML parser process some node fail. An attacker could exploit it to cause memory leak, which may further lead to system exceptions.
